integration_patterns: Cloud-based data storage for health records

evidence.claim: Worksite mentions compliance with HIPAA standards on their security page.
The company utilizes AWS for hosting and cloud infrastructure.
Evidence of EDI X12 transactions mentioned in integration with clearinghouses.
Worksite implements FHIR for interoperability with health management systems.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses HIPAA and EDI X12, indicating relevant use cases for healthcare data exchange.
